modShortDescription: Simple mod that allows you to craft the other doors that are in the game. These can also be upgraded after crafting with the board slats, etc.
modDescription:
Have some nice doors instead of the normal crap! Requires a workbench to craft these, though. Survive in style. Simple mod that allows you to craft the other [doors](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/) that are in the game. These can also be upgraded after crafting with the board slats, etc. But who would want to cover up such a nice door.

Also allows you to craft a Door Knob, since you need one to craft these doors. Canâ€™t have a nice door without a door knob!

Server side friendly, so just drop in and go.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1uV8y5kl2n4cRerpbkr2VW0QcBNRvtLAV)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22349-craft-doors/).

**Credits:** [Iceburg71](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/iceburg71/)
